## Helpers.joinResourceIds() function

Joins a list of [resource ID](./ts-res.resourceid.md) or [resource name](./ts-res.resourcename.md) with to create a new [resource ID](./ts-res.resourceid.md)<!-- -->. Fails if resulting ID is invalid or empty.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function joinResourceIds(...ids: (string | undefined)[]): Result<ResourceId>;
```

</td><td>


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

Result&lt;[ResourceId](./ts-res.resourceid.md)<!-- -->&gt;

`Success` with the new ID if the base and names are valid, or `Failure` with an error message if not.
